title: Apache Spark Programming (DB 105)
description: This course covered the fundamentals of Apache Spark including Spark’s architecture and internals, the core APIs for using Spark, SQL and other high-level data access tools, as well as Spark’s streaming capabilities and machine learning APIs.

title: Intermediate Shiny (RStudio Conference 2019)
description: This covered the basics of Shiny, reactivity, modules, and best-practices.

title: Intro to Deep Learning
description: This was an internal course offered at Sandia National Lab that covered deep learning methods.

title: Docker Fundamentals and Docker for Enterprise Developers
description: This course covered Docker fundamentals, Docker swarm, Docker compose files, YAML format, and more.

title: R and Shiny Training
description: Taught by Matt Pickard this covered the basics of R, dplyr, Shiny, and reactivity.
